overview.heading: Overview
overview.description: This sample is a Visual Studio native graphical console application that enables you to view the geographical location and the distance between airports. It shows how to use native COBOL to handle indexed data files. The information about the airport codes is stored in the airports.dat file.

step.description: To run this demonstration in Visual Studio:

steps.step: Build the solution and start debugging.
Follow the instructions on the console. To see the available airport codes view the airports.dat file by opening it using the Data File Editor.

projectsDescription.heading: Project Description
projectsDescription.intro: The AirportDemo.sln solution includes two projects, AirportConsoleApplication and AirportLinkLibrary.

contents.content: A program that contains the user interface logic of the console application
Data file with all airport records.
Config file that defines the location of the .dat file to be used
A program containing the application logic for reading from the data file and calculating distances
